name: Dotinstall-rails4
body:
##書きかけ～

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/kanedayo/dotinstall-rails4.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/kanedayo/dotinstall-rails4)

[![Code Climate](https://codeclimate.com/github/kanedayo/dotinstall-rails4.png)](https://codeclimate.com/github/kanedayo/dotinstall-rails4)


キーワード | 意味
:------------- | :-------------
DRY | Don't Repeat Yourself
CoC | Convention over Configuration
MVC | Model/View/Controller


```
gem therubyracer # JavaScript Runtime
```
```
#myapp
rails g scaffold User name score:integer
rake db:migrate
```

```
#TaskApp
rails new taskapp --skip-bundle
cd taskapp
vi Gemfile
rails g model project title
```

```
rails db # dbconsole
rails c  # console
```

```
git init
git add .
git commit -m "start point"
git remote add origin git@github.com:kanedayo/dotinstall-rails4.git
```

###Ｑ＆Ａ
rake routesでupdateが二つあります。PTCHとPUTの違いは？

logo画像などを簡単に作成したい。

jQueryのdata-*属性
https://w3g.jp/blog/studies/jquery-data-attr-cache
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
